Question: The ____ Presidential Center was opened in Little Rock, Arkansas in his honor on December 5, 2001.
Hints: As president, this person presided over the longest period of peacetime economic expansion in American history.
After extensive investigation over several years, no indictments were made against the ____s related to the years in Arkansas.
In the first primary contest, the Iowa caucus, this person finished a distant third to Iowa Senator Tom Harkin.
